comments: Bridges (CHA) does not lift his foot from the floor as he turns on his foot.
Smith (CHA) maintains a legal pivot foot at the start of his dribble.
Reaves (LAL) places his right hand momentarily to the front of Smith (CHA) before correcting during the drive, and marginal contact occurs.
Anthony (LAL) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Rozier (CHA) and firms up to absorb the oncoming contact to his body.
Plumlee (CHA) plants his right leg to establish himself in a screening position in the path of Horton-Tucker (LAL) and firms up to absorb the oncoming contact to his body.
Anthony (LAL) cleanly blocks the ball during Rozier's (CHA) driving shot attempt.
Smith (CHA) places a left hand momentarily on Westbrook's (LAL) right side during the drive, and marginal contact occurs.
Plumlee (CHA) attempts to swipe at the ball and makes marginal contact with Westbrook's (LAL) left arm on the drive.
Bridges (CHA) blocks the shot attempt by Westbrook (LAL) before the ball reaches its apex.
Westbrook (LAL) commits a take foul on Ball (CHA).
Reaves (LAL) commits a take foul on Washington (CHA).
